title: FS:  T206 Lajoie, Jennings, Kelley  PRICE DROPPED
author: Jaybird

posts.post_title: FS:  T206 Lajoie, Jennings, Kelley  PRICE DROPPED
posts.post_content:
ALL PRICES include shipping/insurance. $270 for all 3

Jennings - staining at left edge but perfectly smooth.  No creases - $100

Kelley - Notice the Factory no. 25 designation at the top and bottom of the back of the card.  Sort of a double name back.  clean and crease free (upper right corner is a scratch and not a crease).  minor chipping bottom edge (see scans).     - $130

Lajoie - Scuffing in the sky area, crease across his pants - couple of wrinkles on top of card (not breaking through) one towards his hand and the other midway down his sweater, both running left to right (visible at an angle). - $110
